Item.text: try typing something that contains everything that was asked in the question
Ok, now let's help Jordan write the email. First we need a subject, or title for the email. The title should give an idea of what the email is about.
Good job sending the message to Erica. It looks like a new message is in front of us!
Yes, after you send a message you will be directed to the page of your inbox that shows all your mail. Or you can be directed back to another message in your inbox, similar to what was just done.
The message is from Ms. Johnson and Dr. Arthur. It's reminding me i have a meeting with Dr. Arthur at 3 o clock today.
Jordan, do you want to send a message to both Ms. Johnson and Dr. Arthur to let them know you will be at the meeting.
_user_ and Jordan, hello.
Hi everyone. I am having a dilemma! I have a new email account that I don't know how to use!
Well Jordan, we can help you with that. _user_, I bet you can help answer questions Jordan may have.
Yes. It would be great if you could help me. Okay, i'm ready to learn!
Great let's get started!
Ok, here is the main page for my emails. My old email account also had a screen like this where i had to enter stuff to get to my messages.
That sounds right. All email accounts will require you to enter a username and password.
I already entered my username and password. I think we continue by pressing the button that says, login. _user_, can you press the login button for me?
Great message to Ms. Johnson and Dr. Arthur. We answered all of the urgent messages in Jordan's inbox.
I'll go ahead and sign out of my email account then.
_user_, thank you for helping Jordan type and send emails.
Yes! you were such a big help! Now i know what the different folders are for, what spam looks like and how to reply to more than one person.
Yes, and you also know how to get rid of messages, and move messages to the inbox if they were in the spam folder accidentally.
Oh yeah, like the message from Erica. I think I will log back in later on to check my inbox for new emails.
Great idea. You two have a wonderful day and see you soon.
Thanks again everyone. See you both later.
Now that we have the normal email out of the spam folder I want to get rid of the spam emails.
Good idea.
I'm confused about how to get rid of email. Do we put them in the trash folder or the picture of the trash at the top of the screen?
Jordan, typically if you place emails in the trash folder, you can open the folder to view the emails again.
But if I move an email to the picture of the trash can, I cannot see them anymore?
That's right. When you put mail in the trash icon, or the picture of a trash can, you cannot see these messages again. They will be gone.
Oh ok. Well I definitely do not want to see this spam email ever again.
Now that we have a good subject line, let's help Jordan write the message to Jeanine and Dr. Arthur.
Great work. Looks like we are in Jordan's account.
Oh wow. this seems complicated.
Jordan, don't worry. we will help you figure everything out.
Ok. Well can you tell me what those four buttons are on the left side of the screen? They look important.
The buttons that say inbox, outbox, trash, and spam are folders that hold all your messages. Each folder holds a different type of message.
Different types of email can show up inside of an inbox. There will be two important kinds: real email and fake email.
Cristina, what about spam email? People always are saying how bad spam mail is. Shouldn't we talk about spam email too?
Jordan, good point. Fake email is also called spam. Spam is dangerous because people who send it may try to steal your information or trick you into giving them money.
Wow. it looks like Erica and Rachel are having a party for Derek's retirement. I can make chili and bring it for everyone to eat.
Jordan, before you put your apron on and start cooking, let's take a look and see what the message says, and make sure you are invited.
Now that we have a good subject line for the email, let's type a message.
I've pressed on the spam folder so we can see if all of the spam emails have been moved there.
Ok we are in the spam folder, and i see the two emails there. Hey, wait a second... There is an email in the spam folder from my co-worker Erica. But it's not spam!
Jordan, it looks like this email was sent to the spam folder by mistake. Sometimes this happens when your email account does not recognize the email address of the sender.
Well I don't want Erica's emails to end up in the spam folder. How can we stop this?
If we move it to the inbox, then future messages from Erica will be put into the inbox folder.
_user_, thanks for your help. I still want to read Erica's email that we moved into the inbox folder. I pressed on the inbox folder already so we can look for it.
Let's start our email message.

Question.text: Oh ok. I want to read all my new emails. I think these are in the inbox folder._user_, can you select the inbox folder for me?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Here is the inbox, at the top of the folder list. It is highlighted green.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: _user_, please select the inbox.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: _user_, Which folder is the inbox? Give it another go.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: I see where the inbox is now. This is where all my current emails are.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.text: I'll press the inbox so we can look at Jordan's new messages.

Question.text: _user_, I've selected two emails that I believe to be spam. Do you think these two emails are spam? Choose one of the answers below.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: These are both examples of spam emails.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please decide whether these emails are spam. Select an answer below.

Answer.name: IncorrectPrompt
Answer.text: Try it again. Are these emails considered spam email? Select one of the answer options.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: Ok, so spam mail looks different from normal email. It may have funny characters and weird sayings like, click here to get cash.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.text: Since we know these are spam, I'll move them to the spam folder.

Question.text: _user_, i've already selected the email from my friend Erica and I need to move back to the inbox folder. Can you help me move this email to the inbox folder by pressing on the correct folder for me?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The email entitled Erica and Rachel's party was sent to the spam folder. Jordan's email program did not recognize the sender and placed it inside of this folder. If this happens you will want to move these messages to the inbox.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please move the email back to the right folder

Answer.name: A
Answer.text: You selected the inbox folder. That was the correct folder. Erica's email has been moved there. Great work.

Answer.name: B
Answer.text: You selected the outbox folder, the correct folder is the inbox folder. Its at the top of the folder list and i have highlighted it green to indicate it is the correct folder. I went ahead and moved Erica's email there.

Answer.name: D
Answer.text: You selected the spam folder, the right folder is the inbox folder. Its at the top of the folder list and i have highlighted it green to indicate it is the correct folder. I went ahead and moved Erica's email there.

Answer.name: C
Answer.text: You selected the trash folder, the folder that should have been picked is the inbox folder. Its at the top of the folder list and i have highlighted it green to indicate it is the correct folder. I went ahead and moved Erica's email there.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: I see where the inbox folder is now. Thanks you two.

Question.text: _user_, I selected the spam mail. Will you press the button that will permanently get rid of these messages?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: To delete messages you press on the trash bin. In Jordan's account, it's the picture of the garbage can at the top of the screen.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please select a button to delete the spam emails.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.text: Wow Jordan, you are a poet. I'll go ahead and delete these messages for you by pressing the trash bin icon.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: Oh, ok. I think i understand the difference between the trash folder and the trash can. I even made up a rhyme to help me remember: Trash can, put spam.

Question.text: We are in the inbox but I still don't know which email is from Erica. _user_, can you help me by pressing on the email from Erica?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: The top email is the message from Jordan's co-worker. The title, or subject, of the email is Erica and Rachel's party invite.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please press on the email from Jordan's co-worker.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: Oh yeah. There is the email from Erica.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.text: I'll go ahead and press on it so we can read it.

Question.text: Well there is a party and i am invited! I'd like to help Erica set for the party. _user_, can you send her a message for me and tell her that? Which button would I press to reply to her?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: You should press on the reply button. This will allow you to reply only to Erica in the message. The reply all button will send a message to Erica and everyone else who was invited.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please select an answer.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: Since we don't want everyone invited to the party to see my response to Erica, we should press the reply button. Got it.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.text: I'll select reply so we can start to write the email.

Question.text: _user_, i have a feeling you are better at typing, and know where to type the subject. Will you please type something like: Want to help decorate for party. Then press the submit subject button.

Answer.name: Good
Answer.text: That is a very fitting subject line for our email to Jordan's co-worker. Here is another example of a good subject line

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Displayed here is an example of an appropriate subject line

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: Oh so we type in the subject in the top box.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.speech: Yes and the subject or topic gives Erica an idea of what your message is about.

Expectation.text: That's not quite the subject line we want. When writing a subject line, make sure it entails the message you want the receiver to know before they open it. So for example, if I want to send a message to my boss about running late to a meeting I’d make the subject line “Running late to meeting.” Use this idea to type in a subject line for the email to Erica about her party.

Answer.name: Good
Answer.text: That is a really good subject line. Great work typing it in.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: _user_, thanks. Displayed here is an example of an appropriate subject line

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: Oh so we type in the subject in the top box.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.speech: Yes and the subject or topic gives Erica an idea of what your message is about.

Hint.text: That's not quite the subject line I want. Try again to type in the following: Want to help decorate for party.

Answer.name: Good
Answer.text: That is a great answer. I think you are on the right track.Displayed here is an example of an appropriate subject line.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Displayed here is an example of an appropriate subject line

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: Oh so we type in the subject in the top box.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.speech: Yes and the subject or topic gives Erica an idea of what your message is about.

Question.text: _user_, can help me write the message to Erica? Please type this: Hello Erica. I want to help you decorate for the party. Please let me know how i can help. Sincerely, Jordan. Then press the send email button.

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: _user_, here is an example of a good email to send

Answer.name: Good
Answer.text: That was a great message. Displayed here is another example of what a good email could be. It contains all of the appropriate information needed.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.text: So we write the message in the big box and we should end the message with my name so Erica knows it is from me.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.speech: I will go ahead and press the send email button so the message is sent to Erica.

Expectation.text: Hello Erica. I want to help you decorate for the party. Please let me know how i can help. Sincerely, Jordan.

Answer.name: AnswerUser

Question.text: Yes I do. Should i press reply or reply all to write back to both Dr. Arthur and Jeanine Johnson? _user_, will you press the correct button for me?

Answer.name: Correct
Answer.text: Selecting reply all is the best option. There are two people on this current email, Jeanine Johnson and Dr. Arthur, and Jordan wants to respond to both.

Answer.name: BlankPrompt
Answer.text: Please select an answer.

Answer.name: JordanAnswer
Answer.speech: So we press reply all if we want both Dr. Arthur and Jeanine Johnson to get the message. Makes sense.

Answer.name: AnswerUser
Answer.speech: I will go ahead and press the reply all button so we can start to write the message to Jeanine Johnson and Dr. Arthur.

Rule.name: CristinaAskQ
Rule.description: This rule is changed so that only Jordan asks main questions
